CustomObject.description: This platform event is used to create a new BCAccount__c record when a new Brightcove_Account__c record is created. If that sounds like data-duplicate, you're correct. This technical debt is brought to you by the letter F, as in Fusion. Instead of taking 5 minutes to change "BCAccount__c" to "Brightcove_Account__c", we're going to create a new custom object called "BCAccount__c" and then create automation to create a record for it every time a new Brightcove_Account__c record is created. If all of that sounds like more than 5 minutes of work, you'd be correct! If this sounds like madness, you'd also be correct. To whomever inherits this, you have my sincerest apologies. I did not want this hell for me, and I do not wish it on you. Like so much evil in this world, this all exists because I was ordered to do it. May god have mercy on my soul.
CustomObject.label: Brightcove Account Event
